revised_title: Thermal Deformation and Expansion of Crystallized Normal Sulphates of Potassium, Rubidium, and Cesium
tldr: The author investigates the thermal deformation and expansion of crystallized normal sulphates of potassium, rubidium, and cesium. The coefficients of cubical expansion exhibit a progression corresponding to the progression of the atomic weights of the three respective metals. The thermal deformation is of the nature of an expansion in all directions in the crystals of all three sulphates.
